title: Eightfold.Ai| Technical Support Engineer-1 | Bengaluru(Remote)
content:
Education: B.E Tier 3
Years of Experience: 2years 8 months
Date of the Offer: Nov 2023
Company: Eightfold.ai
Title/Level: Technical Support Engineer-1
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 15L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: None
Stock bonus:4L(vested equally over 4 years)
Bonus: 10%(1.5L)
Shift Allowance: min 1.5L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock+Shift allowance): 19L 
Benefits: 18 paid vacation days + 12 paid sick leave days + 12 paid holidays + 5 Employee appreciation days + yearly Training & certification reimbursement:10000 + 3500 mobile/wifi + 15000 onetime remote setup cost + Paternity leave – 16 weeks
Other details: Rejected offer as my current employer mathed this.
